column1: Daboh is a town and a nagar panchayat in Bhind district  in the state of Madhya Pradesh
Daboh is located at 26.03°N 78.88°E﻿ / 26.03; 78.88. It has an average elevation of 161 metres (528 feet).

column3: 897. Males constitute 54% of the population and females 46%. Daboh has an average literacy rate of 60%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 72% and female literacy is 47%. In Daboh
column5: 17% of the population is under 6 years of age.
